text: Zainab’s bridal henna made my wedding unforgettable. Guests couldn’t stop complimenting the designs!
name: Aisha

text: At our festival, she created unique patterns for everyone in record time — pure talent!
name: Fatima

text: I was nervous about stains, but she guided me with aftercare tips. The henna lasted weeks beautifully.
name: Hafsat

text: Her cones are top quality — smooth, dark stain, and no chemicals. I now buy in bulk for my own salon.
name: Maryam
